q: the deal that sent veteran forward Kevin Willis to the Nuggets, Keon Clark quietly stole the show from two of the NBA's top scorers. "We're excited about( Keon Clark )," Toronto coach Lenny Wilkens said. We're trying to work in as quickly as we can, and show him something different every day, and he's just gobbling it up. He's excited about being here and I thought that was just an incredible job he did to step in for( Antonio Davis ). We went to him several times because we wanted him to know we had confidence in him. He did a great job. After helping Toronto eclipse a 20-point first-half deficit, Keon Clark watched helplesSylvester Stallone as Allen Iverson fueled a 17-0 Philadelphia burst with 11 points, leaving the Raptors with an 89-78 deficit with 8:47 left in regulation. Simon Cowell has lent his support to a Save The Children campaign Simon Cowell has finally admitted what the public have always thought- that he is a pain in the a*** . The X Factor judge couldn't resist making a joke about himself in an online video, where he gave his backing to Save The Children's new campaign, No Child Born To Die.

( AFP)- British Prime Minister David Cameron has been damaged by his media chief's resignation over phone-hacking at a tabloid newspaper he headed and the row is unlikely to go away, commentators said Saturday. So far, our worst day in government, a senior aide from David Cameron 's Downing Street office told The Guardian, after Andy Coulson quit as chief of communications on Friday. I like the idea that a 12-year-old on this show can compete with an older singer and a singing group, Simon Cowell said via a statement.
